snippet: Apple's announcements on Wednesday unveiling its much-anticipated iPhone 5, as well as upgrades for the iPod Touch and iPod Nano, elicited many questions from readers. Here are some answers.
abstract: Apple's announcements on Wednesday unveiling its much-anticipated iPhone 5, as well as upgrades for the iPod Touch and iPod Nano, elicited many questions from readers. Here are some answers.

headline.main: Answers to Your Questions About Apple's iPhone 5
